verbose_text: The mechanistic studies confirmed that they can consume GSH and enhance ROS levels, which further decreased the mitochondrial membrane potential, released cytochrome c into the cytoplasm, induced a cascade of caspase 9 and caspase 3 reactions and activated tumor cell apoptosis.
evidence: mitochondrial membrane potential, released cytochrome c into the cytoplasm, induced a cascade of caspase 9 and caspase 3 reactions and activated tumor cell apoptosis
